item.description:
This is the kickoff meeting for the Boston Plone users group. You will get to meet other Plone users in the Boston area, and hopefully learn something new about Plone.

Nate will have just returned from the Plone Conference in Vienna, and will give a post-conf summary of all the cool new happenings in the Plonosphere.

If there's time, he can also do a recap of the Plone 2.1 talk given at the last Python users group meeting, and demonstrate all the new features of Plone 2.1.

If you have specific topics that you'd like to discuss, please post them in the discussion forum. (and yes, we will eventually move this over to a Plone site).

Take the Green Line to Boylston T stop or the Orange or Red line to Downtown Crossing T stop. The Nature Conservancy is located behind Macy's at the corner of Chauncey.
item.name: The Boston Plone October Meetup
